name: Mad Monkey Jungle
description:
We're renowned for our crazy parties and incredible social scene! Our legendary on-site bar is the beating heart of the hostel (Some say the whole of Cairns), offering super cheap drinks including locally brewed Coral Sea beer and an electric atmosphere. 

Welcome to Mad Monkey Jungle, where unforgettable adventures and legendary parties come to life! Located right in the vibrant heart of Cairns, we're your ultimate base for exploring the city by day and experiencing its famous nightlife by night, all while being part of the thriving Mad Monkey Family. Dive into our great outdoor pool oasis for a refreshing swim, then chill out in our massive social spaces designed for meeting new friends and sharing travel tales. If you're feeling creative, our modern kitchen is fully equipped for whipping up meals.

You'll find comfort in every corner with our spacious rooms, all featuring AC to keep you cool in the tropical heat. Each bed comes with its own power point and bed light, plus the added convenience of ensuite bathrooms in all rooms, and many even boast private balconies or courtyard gardens!

Here's what you'll enjoy with every stay:
- Ultrafast WiFi
- Legendary On-Site Bar with Super Cheap Drinks & Locally Brewed Coral Sea Beer
- Massive Social Spaces & Great Outdoor Pool Oasis
- Modern, Fully Equipped Kitchen
- Fully Air-Conditioned Rooms with Ensuites
- Spacious Rooms with Power Point & Bed Light at Each Bed
- Free Events & Nightly Entertainment (including pub crawls to top backpacker bars!)
- Our central Cairns location means you're just a short walk to all the major attractions, ensuring you make the most of this beautiful city. Our dedicated entertainment team is always organising exciting events in the hostel and showing guests the best local spots for cheap eats and drinks.

Important Info for Your Stay:
- Reception is open 8 am - 12 am (midnight). If you plan to check in after midnight, please inform us in advance, as our night manager will assist you.
- Check-out is before 10 am / Check-in is after 2 pm.
- We are a strictly 18+ property. While all adults are welcome, dorm rooms are recommended for guests aged 18 to 35.
- A valid physical passport is required for check-in. Photocopies will not be accepted.
- Your card will be charged 1 day prior to your arrival. Please ensure there are sufficient funds to avoid cancellation.
- Group Bookings: Bookings of 4 or more guests are subject to different terms and conditions, and we cannot guarantee placing all members of a group booking in the same room.
- No E-Bike batteries are allowed on the premises.

We look forward to welcoming you to the Mad Monkey Family so you can experience Cairns in style!

houseRules.notes:
Please note bookings of 4 or more guests are subject to different terms and conditions and we cannot guarantee to place all group bookings in the same room.


Reception open 8am - 12am. Check in after those hours with our night manager. Check out before 10am / Check in after 2pm. Valid passport required at check in. Copies will not be accepted.

We are a strictly 18+ property.
Recommended ages for dorm rooms is 18 to 35. We would advise booking a private room (where available) if outside of this age range for your own comfort.

Your card will be charged 1 day prior to your arrival, please ensure there are sufficient funds.

- Your credit card details have been collected to secure your reservation.
- Your card will be charge 1 day prior to arrival please ensure there are sufficient funds in your account.
- We do not accept guests under the age of 18 years old.
- Prices are quoted in AUD and are subject to change daily. 
- Valid credit card and a valid passport are required upon check in.
- The following payment methods are accepted; cash, credit or debit cards (Visa and MasterCard only). We do not accept American Express. All credit or debit cards incur a 1% payment fee. 
- The guest will be responsible for any loss or damage caused at the hostel by guests or visitors of guests. 
- When booking multiple beds in a shared dorm, we cannot guarantee to put people on the same booking in the same room, however we will do our best.
- Guests may not consume or store food and drinks in their rooms. Alcohol may not be consumed in any room at any time and can only be purchased from the designated bar on site. Any alcohol or food found in the rooms will be removed.
- Smoking is only permitted within the designated smoking areas. 

Property and Cancellation Policies :
- Cancellation of bookings within 24 hours of reservation will be charged 100% cancellation fee for the first nights stay for the number of beds booked.
- If customer fails to show up for the booking and has not give notice of cancellation, reservation will be marked as no show and you will be charged a 100% cancellation fee for the first nights stay for the number of beds booked.

CHRISTMAS AND NEW YEARâ€™S: All bookings between 23rd December and 2nd January are NON-REFUNDABLE and are subject to a 10 night minimum stay. Payment will be processed within 72 hours of booking and if the card cannot be charged then your booking will be cancelled.
Please also note that our reception will be closed to arrival and departures between 23rd December and 2nd January: no check-ins or outs will be allowed during this time. If your booking contains a check in/out scheduled for those dates then it will be subject to immediate cancellation.

categories.category_description: This hostel has begun to introduce practices that result in a positive social and environmental impact, grasping the fundamentals of the Staircase to Sustainability.
